name: K3Connect
0:
”Alexa, ask K3 Connect to unlock my door with password 1234”
”Alexa, ask K3 Connect for my door status”
”Alexa, ask K3 Connect to list all my locks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. three connect
des:
This skill let you communicate with your door locks by voice control.

Requirements:
1. A door lock which can be controlled by K3 Connect App & Alexa.
2. The door lock must be connected to the Internet through a Gateway device.
